subject: Hello
description_text:
Sent from my iPhone
I have been waiting almost a week now for my order. I haven’t even got a confirmation email, I took a screenshot of my order number. When i go to look up my order number it says it doesn’t exist. I also have a bank statement from where the money was transferred out. Please contact me so we can resolve this issue.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 6793。
